import React, {useState} from 'react' import Sidebar from '../../components/Admin/Sidebar' import Topbar from '../../components/Admin/TopBar' import Footer from '../../components/Admin/Footer' import dataFake from '../../dataFake' import Dashboard from '../../pages/views/Admin/Dashboard' import Products from '../../pages/views/Admin/Products' import AddProduct from '../../pages/views/Admin/AddProduct' import EditProduct from '../../pages/views/Admin/EditProduct' import DetailProduct from '../../pages/views/Admin/DetailProduct' import { BrowserRouter as Router, Route, Switch, } from 'react-router-dom' export default ({ children }) => { const [products, setProduct] = useState(dataFake); const onHandleRemove = (id) => { const newProducts = products.filter(product => product.id !== id); setProduct(newProducts); } const onHandleAdd = (product) => { const newProduct = { id: products.length + 1, ...product } setProduct([...products, newProduct]) } const onHandleEdit = (product) => { // console.log(product) } return (
) }
